website_summaries.verdict: This medium-size paw cleaner is suitable for dogs around the size of a border collie or springer spaniel.
pros: Easy to take apart (for cleaning) and put together again
Simple, lightweight, and portable for use on the go
cons: Not as effective on dogs with long hair

customer_reviews.title: SO worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: My yard gets so muddy after it rains and takes days to recover as you can see in the picture. Using this only takes 3 minutes and it saves my carpet from all this mud! I am so happy I bought this product. It is gentle on his feet but is so effective. I recommend having something handy to dry the paws off right away. It only takes a minute to take apart and thoroughly rinse off. I have recommended this to so many people, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kleen Pawz worked great
customer_reviews.text: I have a poodle that hates his feet touched. We just moved to Colorado and I have never experienced such mud before. anyway when he came back in from outside he just stood there with super muddy feet. He was taller (from the mud) too, lol. after a few dips in the Kleen Pawz cup I was able to break loose the big chunks of mud/rocks and then rinse his paws again. dry with a towel and he was happy again. I felt Kleen Pawz made this job a lot easier and I would recommend it to anyone where their dog may get muddy paws.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Big paws and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Everything is exactly as described and I received my order when expected. I like the cord that it comes with so I can hang it on a hook where the dog comes in. Its easy to take the silicone out and clean when I need to. I have to be honest, I’ve only used it twice only because my dog is a jerk. :) However, I was worried about her paws fitting in it because they are huge and they fit great. She’s a 100lb. American Bulldog and her paws are as big as my palms. Great product and I love that the company is a small business.
customer_reviews.author: Custom Jawns

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant idea
customer_reviews.text: After months of rain and snow our yard is really muddy and the grass peels off when she "takes off" after something. This seems to get them fairly clean and then we dry with a towel. She was comfortable allowing us to push her paws into it. The only thing that would make it better, would be a spill proof top. Comes apart easily for cleaning. I got the medium size for my 47 lb german shorthaired pointer. I would say if you're unsure of the size, go larger.
customer_reviews.author: Librarocks

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that works for dirty paws 🐾
customer_reviews.text: Kleen Pawz is a great product. After struggling with getting the mud and dirt off our puppy’s paws we have finally found something that works. We ordered size medium for our 30 pound labradoodle and the size is perfect. We fill and empty after each use, squeeze excess water from paws before drying with a towel works best for us. And it’s easy to clean. She was a little apprehensive at first but after a couple times she doesn’t mind it.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: headline
customer_reviews.text: works good if your dogs feet aren't too muddy. unfortunately, i wanted it for when my dogs feet are very muddy. easy to use, kind of a hassle to clean, much more difficult to put back together than it should be given the simplicity of the overall design. a few tweeks and it could be an amazing product, as is its just alright. with that said, i still use it, and it does save me time on most days.
customer_reviews.author: El-Dave-O

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!!! Have a 9 month old Border Collie, a living rocket if there ever was one. She doesn’t care what she runs through so she has pretty grungy paws at the end of the day. A short session with the K9 Pawz cleaner easily removes any accumulated dirt or moose crap. She actually likes the process and has learned to sit on the porch while I fill the cleaner cup. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this paw cleaner!! It really works to get the dirt and debris off especially since it’s been raining everyday and my yard is all muddy!! I bought the Medium for my 28lb dog but it would work for bigger dogs too!! Keeps all of the grit off my floors!!
customer_reviews.author: Cem

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Took the dogs hiking and I know their paws were a bit dirty as my shoes had mud stuck on them. The concept is good, but the only issue I had was the area we were parked on was muddy. So you wash their paws off only to stand in the mud again. Will use again in a more accommodating area. Otherwise easy to use and rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chow

customer_reviews.title: Life changing gadget!
customer_reviews.text: This is a genius product that has saved me a ton of work! Our dogs find mud if there is the smallest amount of moisture and it has been such a hassle to clean them up before bringing them back in the house. This is the perfect size for our lab mix, and a tiny bit small for our 120-150 lb Great Danes; but it gets the job done. The largest dog is especially skittish when her paws are cleaned, yet this slick gadget lets me lift and dunk each paw without breaking a sweat. I may just need a new workout routine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect much, pleasantly surprised. Really like this product. If your dog is good for nail trims, you should be fine doing this yourself. I towel dry after to help, but this does all the cleaning for me. I have an Australian Shepherd, with tufts between the toes, and this works great. Dogs don’t seem to mind it anymore than the towel. Might be harder for a dog that doesn’t like feet touched.
customer_reviews.author: Smile

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the way this device works! So far my fluffy pawed Cocker Spaniel isn’t getting with the program?!? When I can get her to stand up it works PERFECTLY! However she really wants to sit down when I’m trying to wash her feet. She and I will get there! Practice makes perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Have two dogs and this is a carpet saver this time of year! Planning to order two more, one for our office and one for the car. Bought the medium based on size recommendation, but think I may go to the large because my boys have big paws. The dogs weren't sure what was happening the first time, but they sit still just fine for their paw washes. Ordering was a breeze and I got emails from the seller throughout the process, including making sure I was happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: This paw washer is just what we needed. Just have it ready by the door with a towel next to it and you will see a big difference in your floors. Wash the paws one at a time and towel dry. Almost all the mud is gone and just wet foot prints on the floor, which I can deal with. Dogs seem to get used to it quick as well. This was a good, inexpensive investment. Should have done it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I have a Border Collie who loves to dig her way to Japan in our garden. She gets incredibly dirty. When she gets inside she jumps on my bed so I have to clean her paws before she does that. It is easy to use without getting her and the laundry all wet. Sometimes I have to use it twice on each paw. But it works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Helena Pires Martins

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever bought. My dog is a digger and gets very muddy and dirty feet and this cleans them right up. My dog doesn't mind it at all and actually stands and waits once we enter the house for me to clean them so I think it must feel good also
customer_reviews.author: Misty Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: works great for grass allergy
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to trying one of these for my schnauzer with allergies , and it has made a difference. Not too hard to use and easy to clean. Wash his paws, dry with a towel and in the house. No paw licking!
customer_reviews.author: fredman

customer_reviews.title: Indispensible
customer_reviews.text: Our dog 'loves' the Amigo. Well, as much as any dog who hates having her feet messed with could! We've used it a couple of times and found it superior to the Paw Plunger (which has disappeared...hmmm, maybe the dog has hidden it!). It's just the right size for her at 20# (she now weighs twice as much as she did in the photo taken shortly after her rescue).
customer_reviews.author: B Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs so during the winter with ice and snow and rain, our yard it a muddy disaster. The Kleen Pawz has really helped to reduce the number of muddy paws all over my house. I have already recommended this product to a friend who has a dog. I showed him the Kleen Pawz and he ordered on Amazon right away! If you have dogs, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Could be a bit bigger/longer, but it is still does the job. I have two large yellow labs (70 lbs), and it does a great job with the mud on the paws and nails. Change water often (changing water and cleaning is very easy too).
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cleans their paws GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This works really great!! Our high energy dog goes to doggy daycare a couple times a week and sometimes her paws are dusty/dirty - this works great to clean them quickly and easily!!! Love it so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Mohn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's handy just wish it was a little bigger, because I have a husky that likes to dig so I have to fill it a few times too get his paws clean but otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Toby T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially during rainy season!
customer_reviews.text: We had just finished construction and my whole property was top soil - we had to wait for grass to grow this spring when it was super rainy. This product was a life saver with muddy paws!
customer_reviews.author: Mariana

customer_reviews.title: Dipping paws easy!
customer_reviews.text: Muddy paws! No problem! My furry friends do not mind dipping their dirty paws into the cups. I use warm water and a dab of dish soap and the soft bristles do the rest. No mess
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: My dog does not mind having her paws dunked in the container. It gets the dirt off! Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning up a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has long hair, including on his feet! This is one of the best ways I've found to have him come inside the house without tracking the dirt from outside.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. We have wooden floors and I was tired of cleaning up all the muddy paw prints. This product makes cleaning his paws easier than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for rainy/muddy days!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and does a great job cleaning dirty paws and lower legs. Just don’t fill it up to high.
customer_reviews.author: GhostBear

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesn't mind it at all
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned my dog would resist having her paw stuck in and out of it. While I can't say she loves it, she doesn't mind at all. So, it works.
customer_reviews.author: kskinct

customer_reviews.title: Has potential, but needs some work
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 corgis and a dachshund. Stubby legs that always find ways to get muddy, I like the theory of this gadget but by the time you get enough water into the cup to get their paws clean and then put their paw in a few times you have a messy situation.
customer_reviews.author: Aurian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I wish it came with a towel to clip on it or something. Otherwise I think it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jules78887

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Really helps keep down the tracking of mud into the house by the 4 dogs!
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Genius Product!
customer_reviews.text: I used to keep a small bucket next to my back door to wash my dog’s paws..This is so much more convenient and takes up a lot less room..I fill it with warm water and soap. The soft, rubber-like bristles remove the mud and dirty. Clean up is easy. It comes apart for easy cleaning. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Polly castagliuolo

customer_reviews.title: Save your rugs and furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Saves the rugs! Bought one for outlet family members too.
customer_reviews.author: Toni C.

customer_reviews.title: Great produce!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a lifesaver during a muddy winter. We use it for our miniature Australian Sheep Dog - it does a fantastic job of cleaning his paws, and he doesn't seem to mind it all. It's very gentle, and gets all the mud off very quickly. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: KleenPawz
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome!!! Love it and can’t believe I never knew about this Paw Kleenex!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: My backyard gets pretty muddy when it rains and I also have a dog that likes to dig. I thought this would be too good to be true, but its real. Gone are the days of cleaning each paw pad. Just dip a few times per paw and dry with a towel. Genius!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Kishazy

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to order this product. Unfortunately, I accidentally order the wrong size for my dog and the item was too big. I emailed them about my dilemma and they were very conscious and refunded me for the item Because they didn’t have the appropriate size. That’s called true customer service. Thank you. I have my friend the item I bought since they have a big dog and they have enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: PR

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product works surprisingly well. Expect to refill the water if you have multiple dogs. And, keep a towel to dry off the wet (but no longer muddy) paws.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Had been dipping dog paw in cup of water then drying with towel. The silicone spines work great to loosen the mud and make cleaning dirty paws a one step process. Rinses clean. Genius.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Every dog owner needs this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have 3 dogs and let me tell you! I was so sick of muddy dirty paw prints on my floor. This design works perfectly to get the caked on dirt and mud off their paws! I have been recommending this product to every dog owner I know!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Provost

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t blow me away but it gets the job done. I feel like it is just as effective as dipping your dogs foot in a cup or bowl of water. Regardless, you will still need to wipe clean and dry the paw off no matter the contraption.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Worth

customer_reviews.title: No more muddy prints.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, clean paws now. Dog won't give a good review though, she hates it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs that both run around the yard like maniacs!!! This product works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dirty dog
customer_reviews.text: Dog doesn’t like it. It has to be cleaned after every use. Hair gets wrapped around scrubbers. It is good for EXTREME dirt situations, everyday use not so much.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT DEVICE!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product! So easy to use, except when my dog wants to pull his paw out.
customer_reviews.author: B. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: No more mopping muddy dog tracks!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gadget! Now getting the dogs back inside when it been raining for days doesn’t require a mop. We line up the dogs, wash their feet, wipe them dry and all is good. Seriously, you need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Best $14 ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Best solution to the constant mopping of floors and laundry of bed sheets!! So tired of the monsoon and mud causing my house to be a constant mud collection so tried this out and it saves my floors from looking like I have a ghost dog tracking mud all over my floors!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Enright

customer_reviews.title: Great product however I couldn’t  fit my 100lb dog paw in there
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t fit 100lb dog paw in there. Little guy no problem! It’s such a neat invention, no more mudpaw and that says a lot on a nearly 90% laminated floor.
customer_reviews.author: J Stokes

customer_reviews.title: They come in different sizes?
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea by the posting that these come in different sizes until it came. Unfortunately our dog has almost outgrown this one and we just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Crane

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: The container is rather small. Not much water can be used at one time. The water needs to ba changed after each paw on a muddy day.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and really works
customer_reviews.text: Worked as promised and my active Schnauzer did not mind having her feet dunked into the cup. It actually got her paws cleaner than trying to scrub paws with a towel and less work than using a sink. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: The K9amigo is great for cleaning your dogs paws! No more tracking mud or who knows what through the house anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Kotowski

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! Gets the dirt off our dogs feet super fast. Just need a towel handy to dry off the excess water. This is way easier than wetting a wash rag and wiping each paw.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hughey

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I could have hoped
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets dirty at the dog park, but she hates getting washed. She doesn't, however, mind the K-9 Amigo. She doesn't fight me and I am able to get her paws cleaned easily and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: K Endres

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn't a fan of water or baths but she doesn't seem to mind me cleaning her paws with this! Great alternative to a full bath if it's just muddy paws and legs. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Makes washing my pup’s paws so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Took a few times for the dog to get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Adee

customer_reviews.title: Silicon mat has closures
customer_reviews.text: It works on all of my dogs, but alittle tough on my short legged girl, have to tilt the cup.
customer_reviews.author: dogmom

customer_reviews.title: Much easier!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs that come in all at once. If it’s wet or muddy it’s hard to catch each one and wipe all 4 feet down with a towel. This is much quicker and effective!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I've dumped this thing everytime
customer_reviews.text: Ive got a hyper 18 month lab and while that's probably the issue, its been impossible to get the back legs...
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J.

customer_reviews.title: Great paw cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This paw cleaner works great for our dogs! Should have got one a while ago. Very easy clean up to.
customer_reviews.author: max m.

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so dumb. It’s literally a thousand times easier AND CLEANER to just use a damp towel.
customer_reviews.author: K.Kellogg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to use on my collie. Maybe good for smaller dog with less hair
customer_reviews.author: stacy morgart

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: We have a very active hunting dog and the paw cleaner is super easy to use and gets all the dirt out of his paws quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help me, maybe others with smaller dogs?
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my Labs feet, spilled everywhere. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It works! Easy to use and didn’t freak out my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Jill H. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but needs fine tuning
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't use this item because my dog's paw did not fit. I tried to find a larger size but didn't find one. I think it's a good idea but there should be a more accurate way to ascertain that your pup's paws fit in.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes V. Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it for dirty paws - getting them to cooperate 😂😂
customer_reviews.author: FinChaser

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Easy to use and clean. Does the job of cleaning my dogs paws!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Might be purchasing another one for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Clever little product. Cleana paws and keeps my floors clean
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Griefenstine

customer_reviews.title: It work!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much faster than trying to wipe paws off and so much more effective at getting dirt clumps. 3 medium/large dogs and 11" of rain in 1 week - soooooo glad I had this on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Moyers

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: No go. Over a little paw and it's no good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I used to struggle to get my dogs paws cleaned in a pan of water. While he doesn't love it he lets me clean his paws without any fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Dolloff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a super muddy yard and this thing is amazing. So easy to use and saves me from constantly mopping. Life saver.
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline Shin

customer_reviews.title: Easy paw cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This has made paw cleaning a breeze! We have two pups so cleaning 8 paws was some work, but not anymore. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this for cleaning your dogs paws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very efficient way to clean off dirty paws after they have been running around outside. We used to towel them off, but the bristles work much better and quicker. The paws need to be towel dried after however. Also, it can be a little difficult to reach the dew claw. Overall great product and build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Facebook. Took a chance, and bought one. Well made, works excellent! Easy to clean. And our dog doesn’t mind it at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. McDorman

product_meta.title: K9Amigo Kleen Pawz Dog Paw Cleaner (Medium) Handy & Portable Paw Washer for Dogs for Clean Paws Anywhere Anytime!, Green
product_meta.description:
We all know the feeling - a great day at the beach, hiking or at the park and when it comes time to go home, the dog brings sand or dirt into the car. 

Or, the dog has been outside in the yard and is at the back door, waiting to come in but her paws are covered in mud! 

Once upon a time, this called for a bucket of water, a damp cloth and a towel just to give them that quick clean up. 

NOT ANY MORE! With the K9Amigo Kleen Pawz dog paw cleaner, a quick plunge and a wipe and your dog is good to come back in. No more tiresome splashing around with a bucket. No more headache with fully washing your pet's grubby mitts! Enjoy paw print free carpets and floors after that outdoor play. 

Easy and simple to use 
🐶 Just add a little water 
🐶 Insert paw, then gently twist 
🐶 Gently pat dry and no more muddy paw prints through the house! 

The Medium size Kleen Pawz suits breeds such as: 
🐶 Australian Shepherd 
🐶 Basset Hound 
🐶 Border Collie 
🐶 Springer Spaniel 
🐶 Bull Terrier 
And many others. 

The Kleen Pawz cup measures approximately 3.5 inches by 5.9 inches and features: 
🐶 Soft, gentle silicone bristles 
🐶 A handy carry strap 
🐶 Take it anywhere! 

Go on, click on Add to Cart now to get your K9Amigo Kleen Pawz before your next family outing!
feature_bullets: Your dog LOVES muddy paws you LOVE clean floors! KEEP YOUR DOG PAWS CLEAN quickly and easily! No more muddy paw prints!

Enjoying time with your dog at the beach hiking at the park on vacation - the Kleen Pawz portable plunger is CONVENIENT AND EASY to keep at the back door or in the car where ever you and your K9 Amigo spend time together.
THIS MAKES CLEANING SO EASY! A quick plunge in the Kleen Pawz paw washer cup is all it takes to clean dog feet from sand mud dirt and grit on wet days or dry!
FASTER AND LESS MESS than a bucket of water! Relax knowing that the soft silicone bristles are doing the dirty work for you while gently massaging your dog's paws.
Perfect for a dog who thinks that if you don't get your paws muddy then you've wasted the day.
